/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The street is lined with modern buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. In the foreground, trees and street furniture add depth to the image, leading the viewer's eye towards the buildings in the background.
